useCase.name: Manage Capabilities
useCase.trigger: DevOpsEngineer or ApplicationDeveloper initiates a capability management action.

mainSequence.step: Capability Manager executes the deployment process.
REST API receives the request for capability deployment.
Capability Manager executes the removal process.
REST API receives the request for capability removal.
Capability Manager executes the update process.
REST API receives the request for capability update.
Capability Manager displays the available capabilities.
REST API responds with the list of capabilities.
